datasets.name: 11993e6d
datasets.displayName: Customer Payment and Adjustment Events Summary Dataset
queryLines:
SELECT
  v.btn,
  v.dpi_environment,
  v.customer_name,
  v.service_address,

  'PAYMENT'        AS event_type,
  pay.payment_date AS event_date,
  pay.amount       AS event_amount,

  pay.type         AS payment_type,
  pay.type_desc    AS payment_type_description,

  NULL             AS adjustment_code,
  NULL             AS adjustment_description,

  NULL             AS treatment_type,
  NULL             AS treatment_type_description,
  NULL             AS treatment_status
FROM teamconnect.pca_prism.vw_account_prism v
LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE(v.payment_ledger_last_12m) exploded_pay AS pay

UNION ALL

-- ADJUSTMENTS
SELECT
  v.btn,
  v.dpi_environment,
  v.customer_name,
  v.service_address,

  'ADJUSTMENT'          AS event_type,
  adj.post_date         AS event_date,
  adj.amount            AS event_amount,

  NULL                  AS payment_type,
  NULL                  AS payment_type_description,

  adj.credit_code       AS adjustment_code,
  adj.credit_desc       AS adjustment_description,

  NULL                  AS treatment_type,
  NULL                  AS treatment_type_description,
  NULL                  AS treatment_status
FROM teamconnect.pca_prism.vw_account_prism v
LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE(v.adjustments_last_12m) exploded_adj AS adj

UNION ALL

-- TREATMENTS
SELECT
  v.btn,
  v.dpi_environment,
  v.customer_name,
  v.service_address,

  'TREATMENT'                 AS event_type,
  trt.treatment_date          AS event_date,
  trt.treatment_amount        AS event_amount,

  NULL                        AS payment_type,
  NULL                        AS payment_type_description,

  NULL                        AS adjustment_code,
  NULL                        AS adjustment_description,

  trt.treatment_type          AS treatment_type,
  trt.treatment_type_description AS treatment_type_description,
  trt.treatment_status        AS treatment_status
FROM teamconnect.pca_prism.vw_account_prism v
LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE(v.treatment_events_last_12m) exploded_trt AS trt;

datasets.name: 6b04b68c
datasets.displayName: Account Adjustments Summary for Last Twelve Months
queryLines:
SELECT
    v.btn,
    v.dpi_environment,
    v.customer_name,
    v.service_address,
    a.credit_code,
    a.credit_desc,
    a.amount,
    a.post_date
FROM teamconnect.pca_prism.vw_account_prism v
LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE(v.adjustments_last_12m) AS a;

datasets.name: b91f79b5
datasets.displayName: Active Promotions Details by Account Dataset
queryLines:
SELECT
  v.btn,
  v.dpi_environment,
  v.customer_name,
  v.service_address,
  pr.promo_code,
  pr.promo_start,
  pr.promo_end
FROM teamconnect.pca_prism.vw_account_prism v
LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE(v.active_promos) AS pr;

datasets.name: 0d525c15
datasets.displayName: Account Services Overview with Environment Details
queryLines:
SELECT
  v.btn,
  v.dpi_environment,
  v.customer_name,
  v.service_address,
  v.dpi_environment,
  v.current_mrc_sum,
  cs.*
FROM teamconnect.pca_prism.vw_account_prism v
LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE(v.current_services) exploded AS cs;

datasets.name: 07fea7ea
queryLines:
WITH scored AS (
  SELECT
    v.*,
    -- completeness score: higher = richer test account
    (
      CASE WHEN payments_count_12m > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END +
      CASE WHEN size(payment_ledger_last_12m) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END +
      CASE WHEN current_mrc_sum > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END +
      CASE WHEN size(current_services) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END +
      CASE WHEN size(adjustments_last_12m) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END +
      CASE WHEN adjustments_current_month_sum <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END +
      CASE WHEN size(active_promos) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END +
      CASE WHEN size(recent_promos_12m) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END +
      CASE WHEN suspend_open_flag IS NOT NULL 
             OR dpa_open_flag IS NOT NULL 
             OR nsf_open_flag IS NOT NULL 
             OR ovr_open_flag IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END +
      CASE WHEN other_btns_same_name_addr IS NOT NULL 
             AND size(other_btns_same_name_addr) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
    ) AS completeness_score
  FROM teamconnect.pca_prism.vw_account_prism v
)
SELECT
  btn,
  dpi_environment,
  completeness_score,
  customer_name,
  days_in_service,
  payments_count_12m,
  current_mrc_sum,
  adjustments_sum_all_time,
  size(current_services)        AS svc_cnt,
  size(payment_ledger_last_12m) AS pay_txn_cnt_12m,
  size(adjustments_last_12m)    AS adj_txn_cnt_12m,
  size(active_promos)           AS active_promo_cnt,
  size(recent_promos_12m)       AS recent_promo_cnt,
  size(other_btns_same_name_addr) AS linked_acct_cnt
FROM scored
WHERE completeness_score >= 5         -- loosen/tighten as needed
ORDER BY completeness_score DESC,
         payments_count_12m DESC,
         current_mrc_sum DESC
LIMIT 100;

datasets.name: a0bbdd01
datasets.displayName: Account Button Mapping with Related Identifiers Dataset
queryLines:
SELECT
  v.btn AS primary_btn,
  v.dpi_environment,
  v.customer_name,
  v.service_address,
  other_btn
FROM teamconnect.pca_prism.vw_account_prism v
LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE(v.other_btns_same_name_addr) AS other_btn;

datasets.name: 80213dee
datasets.displayName: Recent Payment Ledger Details by Account and Environment
queryLines:
SELECT
  v.btn,
  v.dpi_environment,
  v.customer_name,
  v.service_address,
  p.payment_date,
  p.amount,
  p.type,
  p.type_desc    AS payment_type_description
FROM teamconnect.pca_prism.vw_account_prism v
LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE(v.payment_ledger_last_12m) AS p

datasets.name: ee3e8673
datasets.displayName: Account Service Address Button Frequency Summary
queryLines:
WITH base AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT btn, dpi_environment, customer_name, service_address
    FROM teamconnect.pca_prism.vw_account_prism
),
btn_counts AS (
    SELECT
        dpi_environment,
        customer_name,
        service_address,
        COUNT(DISTINCT btn) AS total_btns
    FROM base
    GROUP BY dpi_environment, customer_name, service_address
)
SELECT
    b.btn,
    bc.total_btns - 1 AS other_btns_same_name_addr
FROM base b
JOIN btn_counts bc
  ON b.dpi_environment = bc.dpi_environment
 AND b.customer_name = bc.customer_name
 AND b.service_address = bc.service_address

datasets.name: 8b270847
datasets.displayName: Team Connect Trouble Ticket Insights Summary

datasets.name: b0ce6ba0
queryLines:
SELECT 
  channel_level_1,
  channel_level_2,
  COUNT(*) AS total_orders,
  SUM(total_products_added_value) AS total_revenue,
  AVG(data_completeness_score) AS avg_data_quality,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN enhanced_migration_type LIKE 'MIGRATION:%' THEN 1 END) AS migrations,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN enhanced_technology = 'FIBER' THEN 1 END) AS fiber_orders
FROM teamconnect.pca_prism.vw_service_orders_enhanced
WHERE match_quality IN ('EXACT_MATCH', 'PHONE_MATCH')
  AND channel_level_1 IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY channel_level_1, channel_level_2
ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;

lines:
Billing Details

A unified view of customer account activity, combining services, payments, promotions, adjustments, and treatment status into a single profile. Use this panel to quickly assess account health, recent billing behavior, and key events over the past 12 months.
How to Use This Dashboard - Select a BTN to load the account. - All widgets update automatically. - Drill down for full details.
